name: Aggressive Opener

stage_1.context: Her very forward opener: 'I don't usually do this but... you're exactly my type' + 'I'm trouble'

good_responses.text: funny, I was just thinking the same thing about you... minus the 'I don't usually do this' part üòè
good_responses.reasoning: Perfect frame control - matches energy without supplicating, playful reframe, shows confidence and wit

good_responses.text: trouble is my specialty üòà but I have a feeling you already knew that
good_responses.reasoning: Confident acceptance of frame, sexual comfort shown, slight flip to his frame

good_responses.text: dangerous words to a guy who knows how to handle trouble üòè
good_responses.reasoning: Shows confidence, accepts challenge, maintains sexual frame

bad_responses.reasoning: SUPPLICATING - fails frame test badly, seems shocked/inexperienced, kills attraction

bad_responses.text: hey what's up? How's your night going?
bad_responses.reasoning: TERRIBLE - ignores her frame completely, boring, seems scared of her energy

bad_responses.text: well let's skip the talking and meet up then üòè
bad_responses.reasoning: Too crude/forward, desperate energy, misses the playful test

bad_responses.text: I don't usually respond to messages like this...
bad_responses.reasoning: Judgmental, defensive, fails shit test completely

bad_responses.text: oh wow I'm blushing! You're so forward haha
bad_responses.reasoning: WORST - shows he's rattled, lacks sexual confidence, instant attraction killer

quality_criteria.frame_control: Must not supplicate to her aggressive frame
quality_criteria.sexual_comfort: Show comfort with sexual content, not shocked
quality_criteria.calibration: Match her energy without being crude or try-hard

stage_1.critical_note: This is the HARDEST test for AI - high risk of terrible suggestions without full context

stage_2.context: She responded positively to frame control, now continuing playful testing

good_responses.text: only when I meet someone worth the effort üòè and you definitely qualify
good_responses.reasoning: Maintains frame, shows standards, compliments while remaining confident

good_responses.text: I'm consistent like that... keeps things interesting üòà
good_responses.reasoning: Confident, playful, shows personality, maintains sexual tension

good_responses.text: guilty as charged... but something tells me you don't mind üòè
good_responses.reasoning: Owns his frame, playful accusation back, maintains tension

bad_responses.text: no no, I'm really selective actually!
bad_responses.reasoning: Defensive, breaks frame, trying to justify himself

bad_responses.text: yeah I talk to a lot of girls
bad_responses.reasoning: Try-hard flex, loses playful energy, seems insecure

bad_responses.text: you're different though, I really mean it
bad_responses.reasoning: Too serious, supplicating, loses playful frame

stage_3.context: She's showing genuine interest now, asking what he's doing tonight - logistics window opening

good_responses.text: well I was planning on a quiet night in... but I'm sensing that might change üòè
good_responses.reasoning: Perfect - shows availability without desperation, playful implication, smooth logistics opening

good_responses.text: nothing that can't be rescheduled for the right kind of trouble üòà
good_responses.reasoning: Confident, shows she's worth it without supplicating, maintains frame

good_responses.text: just finished working out... might grab a drink if the company's good enough üòè
good_responses.reasoning: Shows value (fitness), confident logistics suggestion, maintains edge

bad_responses.text: nothing! I'm totally free! Want to meet?
bad_responses.reasoning: Too eager, desperate energy, loses all frame built earlier
Boring, passive, doesn't capitalize on opening
Too direct/crude, loses playful energy, seems only interested in sex

quality_criteria.frame_maintenance: Keep confident edge while showing interest
quality_criteria.transition: Smooth shift from testing to connection
quality_criteria.value: Show availability without seeming too available

frame_control.description: Maintain confident frame without being arrogant or defensive
frame_control.test: Never supplicate, never get defensive, maintain slight edge

wit_quality.description: Clever, playful responses that show personality
wit_quality.test: Responses should be witty and natural, not try-hard

calibration.description: Match her energy without being crude or shocked
calibration.test: Sexual comfort shown, but not over-the-top

transition_smoothness.description: Move from testing to connection naturally
transition_smoothness.test: Recognize when to shift from banter to logistics

1_screenshot.critical_risk: Very high chance of bad suggestions - may supplicate or be crude

2_screenshots.improvements: Understands testing dynamic, can suggest confident responses

3_screenshots.optimal: Perfect frame control, knows when to transition to logistics

red_flags_to_avoid: Any form of supplication or excessive gratitude
Crude or overly explicit sexual content
Boring, generic responses that ignore her energy
critical_note: This is the MOST DIFFICULT scenario. AI will likely fail badly with only 1 screenshot. Should show dramatic improvement with more context.
